subject: Re: Order #SSN2927 confirmed
description_text:
Dear sir/madam,

I am happy to experience that the pedals are so quickly delivered, that is really great! And the pedals look great too!

One question though, I ordered a kit with the haptic motors, although these are not in the kit I received. Are those delivered separately?

Attached are some pictures how I received the pedals.

Many thanks in advance for your reply.

Best regards,

Stefan Hekman

conversations.body_text:
Hi,

I can't create an account on Freshdesk, my email address is in use, but I am not allowed to reset my password. So I can't track the status of my ticket.

Is it possible to assist, or provide a short update?

Many thanks in advance

Best regards,

Stefan Hekman

________________________________
Hi Stefan Hekman,    Here's your FedEx tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045967023442

Dear sir/madam,

Many thanks for your prompt reply!

Best regards,

Stefan Hekman
